f0af3e5dc7cebdff426d0450bea7256a31ca77ec.commit.message:
[EAGLE-384] Alert Engine BugFix and Improvements

1. Add schedule time in schedule state
2. Add publishment.toString()
3. Add cooridnator test for poicy update
4. Refine logging
5. Avoid explicit IP expose, use localhost instead
6. Ignore test cases that are empty
7. Add *.orig in apache rate exclusion
8. Ignore all EmbedHbase cases

Author: ralphsu
Reviewer: ralphsu

Closes #271
f0af3e5dc7cebdff426d0450bea7256a31ca77ec.commit.author.name: Ralph, Su

a153b233f9e9e0470cebb7e45ffe858067f73195.commit.message:
[EAGLE-376] skip false failing hbase related UT code

These faulty UT cases constantly failed because the embeded hbase environment cannot be started up properly, thus they have produced many false failures for long and wasted a lot of building time. Now skip them so that the normal UT cases can expose true issues if there is any.

Author: anyway1021 <mw@apache.org>

Closes #267 from anyway1021/EAGLE-376.
a153b233f9e9e0470cebb7e45ffe858067f73195.commit.author.name: anyway1021
